name: worldshaper
description: An app that helps GMs and players create worlds to play in.

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/* && rm -rf src/config/* && rm -rf dist && rm -rf src/config
scripts.reset: mkdir dist && mkdir dist/fonts && mkdir src/config
scripts.thirdParty: uglifyjs node_modules/lodash/index.js node_modules/angular/angular.min.js node_modules/angular-ui-router/release/angular-ui-router.min.js node_modules/ngstorage/ngStorage.min.js -c -m -o dist/third-party.min.js --source-map dist/third-party.min.js.map
scripts.prebuild:internal: npm run clean && npm run reset
scripts.build:internal: npm run jshint && npm run annotate-files && npm run uglify && npm run annotate-files -- -d
scripts.build:external: npm run thirdParty && npm run styles && npm run fonts
scripts.build:static: npm run copyHtml && npm run less
scripts.build: npm run build:static && npm run build:internal && npm run build:external
scripts.build:local: npm run build && npm run config:local && npm run test
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run config:prod && npm run test -- --single-run
